objectDef.propertyDef:
switch{ case self.objTradeAgreement == null:
switch{ case self.objNation.objStatus.instanceOf(gs_tbg.NationStatusPuppet) AND self.objNation.getMasterNation(mh2data.objAvatar) == mh2data.objNation:
case self.objNation.objStatus.instanceOf(gs_tbg.NationStatusPuppet) AND self.objNation.getMasterNation(mh2data.objAvatar) != mh2data.objNation AND gs_tbg.getWar(mh2data.objAvatar, self.objNation, mh2data.objNation) == null:
case self.objNation.objStatus.instanceOf(gs_tbg.NationStatusPuppet) AND self.objNation.getMasterNation(mh2data.objAvatar) != mh2data.objNation AND gs_tbg.getWar(mh2data.objAvatar, self.objNation, mh2data.objNation) != null:
case gs_tbg.getNationAlliance(mh2data.objAvatar, self.objNation) == gs_tbg.getNationAlliance(mh2data.objAvatar, mh2data.objNation) AND gs_tbg.getNationAlliance(mh2data.objAvatar, self.objNation) != null AND gs_tbg.getNationAlliance(mh2data.objAvatar, mh2data.objNation) != null:
case gs_tbg.getWar(mh2data.objAvatar, self.objNation, mh2data.objNation) != null:
default:
} }
